Title: internetarchive (@internetarchive@mastodon.archive.org)
Description:
Sorry to say, archive.org is under a ddos attack. The data is not affected, but most services are unavailable.

We are working on it & will post updates in comments.

Title: Should I Use JWTs For Authentication Tokens?
Description: No.Not satisfied? Fine, fine. I'll write a longer answer.Let's talk about what we're talking about. JWT stands for JSON Web Tokens, a reasonably well defined standard for authenticated to
